data.message: Please for the love of cheez its... give us an option to block ALL private messages.

replies.message: Thanks for the suggestion, Melissa. We're listening to all our community feedback, so if you have any more, please feel free to share it here: http://on.fb.me/ZWcSro. -Rose

I agree with Melissa, we need a button that completely shuts messages off.  I do not want messages going in my inbox either.  I do not need people bothering me while I am liking and sharing my friends and pages posts.   Some people are rude and I do not need those wasting my time.  I have had positive feed back with all this liking, sharing and comments.
